BR_text.BRsummary: [BUG] Always in MANU mode on Pi3
BR_text.BRdescription:
Describe the bug
 1.1.0RC0 on Pi3 always starts in MANU mode, despite of the ethernet cable being connected or not
 Expected behavior
 When ethernet cable is disconnected it should start in AUTO mode.
 Environment (please complete the following information):
 
 Pwnagotchi version: 1.1.0RC0
 Type of hardware: Raspberry Pi3+
 
 
 A fix has been posted <denchmark-link:https://www.reddit.com/r/pwnagotchi/comments/dnz5p2/pi3_always_boots_to_manu/f5j3up9/>on Reddit</denchmark-link>
  and also <denchmark-link:https://github.com/evilsocket/pwnagotchi/commit/a78a4b0b3e5cfbdfea481e140e6c02e0bdb1f72d#commitcomment-35683998>here</denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text: Can be replicated on the Pi 4, also.
